name: Hiker's Boots
desc: Striking enemies from a higher elevation grants +1% (+1% per stack) critical strike chance and critical strike damage , up to 10 times . Lasts 10 seconds.
notes:
The Hiker's Boots are an item in Risk of Rain 2, added in the Alloyed Collective expansion.
When the player strikes an enemy below them, the item grants a buff that increases the player's critical strike chance and critical strike damage by 1% (+1% per stack), up to a maximum of 10 times. The effect lasts 10 seconds, and dealing any damage with a proc coefficient, regardless of elevation, refreshes the 10s duration. The buff will only be applied once in a proc chain.


== Notes ==
Correction: The in-game description does not specify the buff's duration resetting upon damaging enemies.
The buff's duration will be reset even if the player is below the enemy.
The item triggers when the attacker’s center is at least one radius (≈ half their height) above the target’s center, meaning the attacker’s feet only need to reach roughly the target’s mid-body to activate the bonus.


== Tips ==
 Hopoo Feather,  Faraday Spur, and  H3AD-5T v2 synergize very well with this item, allowing a consistent way to get above most enemies.
At 10 stacks or more of Hiker's Boots, you can reach 100% critical strike chance. Given this,  Lost Seer's Lenses are more appealing with Hiker's Boots, as  Lens-Maker's Glasses are no longer required to guarantee critical strikes.
Certain survivors will benefit greatly from this item, as they have ways to consistently stay above their enemies.
  Artificer's   Ion Surge combined with   ENV Suit.
  Mercenary can chain his skills together to stay in the air, along with his natural double jump.
  Operator's   Ascent Protocol with enough drones.
Due to   Railgunner's   Magnetic Accelerator, her critical strike damage will increase by 2% (+2% per item stack) per stack of the buff.
